video.title: Señora Acero
video.synopsis: When her drug-trafficking husband dies, an unassuming woman stakes her own claim in the business in order to care for her gravely ill son.

episodes.synopsis: About to be captured by the police in 2007, Sara recalls a joyful day in Tijuana that turned tragic, forever changing the direction of her life.
episodes.title: Bride and Widow

episodes.synopsis: Vicente's sister-in-law, Mariana, realizes she has a target on her back. Sara learns her husband was involved in shady dealings.
episodes.title: Widow of the Narco

episodes.synopsis: When Felipe accuses him of an impropriety, Junio loses his temper and, later, pays the consequences. Sara finds herself living in a car.
episodes.title: Felipe Mistreats Sara

episodes.synopsis: Junio gets bad news from the doctor. To save his skin, Felipe makes a deal with El Indio. Mariana is offered a position of power, with one condition.
episodes.title: Sara Is Saved

episodes.synopsis: Sara comes face to face with El Capi. Realizing the hospital surgeon is in cahoots with El Indio, Junio forces him to confess what he did to Sara.
episodes.title: Sara Is Watched

episodes.synopsis: In Guadalajara, Salvador falls ill. Meanwhile, the boss of new neighbor Aracely must contend with a medical emergency of her own at her beauty salon.
episodes.title: Salvador Faints

episodes.synopsis: The doctor gives Sara grave news. Mariana tells El Indio that Junio is now a threat. Thinking the undercover cop is following her, Sara makes a scene.
episodes.title: Kill Junio

episodes.synopsis: Mariana lures Junio into an ambush. Sara realizes where the $3 million is hidden. Salvador regains consciousness and shares vital information.
episodes.title: Salvador Wakes Up

episodes.synopsis: Sara gets a surprise gift. To save herself, Mariana tells a secret to Junio. The sisters' bodies are found. Aracely recognizes a suspect on a flier.
episodes.title: Mariana Shares News

episodes.synopsis: Miriam finds a record of Magdalena's procedure. Sara makes her way to Mexicali, unaware she's being followed. Elio recognizes one of the bodies.
episodes.title: Dangerous Discovery

episodes.synopsis: Juan ensures Miriam will keep quiet. Pretending to be a forensic doctor, Elio visits Lupita. A vengeful Berta gets a gun and tracks down Sara.
episodes.title: Berta Wants to Kill Sara

episodes.synopsis: Enriqueta picks a person to pin her crimes on. Junio plots a way to get Sara past police checkpoints. Josefina learns Berta's prognosis.
episodes.title: Sara Is Arrested

episodes.synopsis: Elio arrives at the salon with a search warrant. Carlota gets a horrifying voicemail. Threatened with bodily harm, Aracely scrambles to pay her debt.
episodes.title: Beating

episodes.synopsis: Sara makes an ally in jail. To lure Felipe, Elio feeds false information to Gutierrez. Aracely returns to old vices. Enriqueta plans a career change.
episodes.title: Sara Is Attacked

episodes.synopsis: Felipe and Mariana follow Sara home, where Junio proves himself a hero. During a bust, Elio suspects police corruption. Sara learns of Miriam's past.
episodes.title: Junio and Mariana Face Off

episodes.synopsis: Lupita begs Enriqueta to perform breast implant surgery on her. Salvador develops a complication. Juan plots with Miriam's ex. Empanada returns.
episodes.title: Sara Gets a Kiss

episodes.synopsis: Elio learns who's in cahoots with Cortés, and later faces an ethical dilemma. While Lupita goes under the knife, her blood test results come back.
episodes.title: Sara Against Juan

episodes.synopsis: Aracely succumbs to temptation to forget her woes. Sara unleashes her anger on Enriqueta, who gets revenge. Juan manipulates Miriam to get her son.
episodes.title: Sara Against Enriqueta

episodes.synopsis: Enriqueta finds herself in a new home but without allies. Sara and Elio's relationship reaches a turning point. The police receive a disturbing video.
episodes.title: Everything for a Child

episodes.synopsis: Mariana goes to Colombia. Aracely runs into an ex. Elio is backed into a corner at work. Enriqueta finds a way to regain the upper hand with Cornelia.
episodes.title: Elio Is Accused

episodes.synopsis: Aracely gets a frantic call from her mother. Carlota tries to reconcile with Sara. Mariana overhears Juan on the phone. Sara discovers Elio's stash.
episodes.title: Caught Lying

episodes.synopsis: Juan launches his kidnapping plan. At Salvador's new hospital, Sara gets some crushing news and later discovers that Elio's been keeping a secret.
episodes.title: Juan Attacks

episodes.synopsis: Carlota gets some good news. Enriqueta's assassin starts her mission. Elio's domestic troubles come to light. Aracely is reunited with Plutarco.
episodes.title: Suffering Heart

episodes.synopsis: When Salvador's need for a transplant becomes urgent, Elio uses insider information to intercept a shipment of drug money and pay for the surgery.
episodes.title: Elio Steals from the Narcos

episodes.synopsis: Berta thwarts Carlota's plans to donate her kidney. Pepito is lured away from school. Elio tries to sell what he stole. Vanessa recalls a tragic day.
episodes.title: Elio Is Kidnapped

episodes.synopsis: Berta abuses her power as mayor. Sara begs Elio to get her in a meeting with Quintanilla. Vanessa snoops around the hospital for information.
episodes.title: Sara Wants to Go into the Business

episodes.synopsis: Sara strikes a deal with Quintanilla, but with strings attached. Vanessa's tampering with Patricia's food and drink results in an emergency.
episodes.title: Quintanilla Is Generous

episodes.synopsis: Salvador undergoes the transplant procedure. Arnulfo gets Pepito's DNA test results. Elio pays his debt to El Indio and gets an unexpected response.
episodes.title: Job Offer

episodes.synopsis: Pepito is groomed for a future career. Sara gets two surprise gifts. Miriam gives Sara smuggling tips. Elio has a delicate talk with Patricia.
episodes.title: Unleashed Passion

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa gets revenge against Elio. Sara does her first smuggling job. Juan gets out of prison. Arnulfo and Empanada feed Pepito a lie about his mom.
episodes.title: Sara the Smuggler

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa's father reveals a secret to Elio. Quintanilla asks to see Sara right away. Juan seeks Enriqueta's help. Sara gets a reward she doesn't want.
episodes.title: Sara's Liberation

episodes.synopsis: Juan confronts Empanada for betraying him. Sara comes clean to Elio about her new job, and later gets news that leads her to choose a path of revenge.
episodes.title: Death Order

episodes.synopsis: Juan plants an explosive device. Empanada hires someone to kill Enriqueta in prison. Vanessa confronts Elio at gunpoint, with tragic consequences.
episodes.title: Saved from Death

episodes.synopsis: Enriqueta's former ally in prison turns against her. Quintanilla leaves a message for El Indio on Sara's behalf. Elio learns who planted the bomb.
episodes.title: Enriqueta Is Cornered

episodes.synopsis: Aracely introduces Plutarco to her family. Vanessa's father grants Elio a secret favor. Sara helps Quintanilla salvage a blocked drug shipment.
episodes.title: Elio Goes After Juan

episodes.synopsis: Aracely's ex blackmails her. El Indio discovers fate has already avenged his son's death. Elio is blindsided in prison. Pepito tries to run away.
episodes.title: An Eye for an Eye

episodes.synopsis: Empanada tries to seduce Mariana. Martín ruins Aracely and Plutarco's romantic evening. While in Los Angeles, Sara spots Arnulfo and confronts him.
episodes.title: Sara Is in Danger

episodes.synopsis: Sara reveals a happy secret to an inconsolable Aracely. While trying to smuggle Quintanilla's $70 million, Elio and Sara are stopped at the border.
episodes.title: Hands on the Money

episodes.synopsis: Three years pass. Sara decides she will retire from smuggling and laundering after completing one last job -- her biggest and riskiest one yet.
episodes.title: Mafia Baptism

episodes.synopsis: While smuggling the $150 million, Sara is stopped at the border. Salvador no longer believes his mother's promises. Berta's maid drops a bombshell.
episodes.title: Trouble at the Border

episodes.synopsis: Sara is forced to pay for Vicente's past. Rufino collects evidence of Empanada's true nature. Salvador breaks the rules and answers a phone call.
episodes.title: Attempted Abuse

episodes.synopsis: Quintanilla cuts ties with Elio. Aracely reconnects with Plutarco. Carlota invites Berta to visit. Miriam and Joaquín prepare to cross the border.
episodes.title: Death Threat

episodes.synopsis: The Drug Enforcement Agency learns there's a price on Elio's head. Miriam and Joaquín reach the border. A plumbing problem leads to a discovery.
episodes.title: The Bone

episodes.synopsis: Miriam finds her son. Edith goes undercover as Sara's new cellmate. Quintanilla plans to kill El Indio's secret boss. The DEA offers Sara a deal.
episodes.title: Deliver Quintanilla

episodes.synopsis: Elio is shot by El Indio's hit man. Edith eavesdrops on Sara in a private conversation. Rufino spots Empanada with El Indio. Cruz attacks Visitación.
episodes.title: Elio Is Shot

episodes.synopsis: Both cartels prepare for the cardinal's arrival in Guadalajara. Cortés takes down a fellow PGR officer. Sara and Edith enter into a partnership.
episodes.title: Cruz Is Questioned

episodes.synopsis: Aracely is robbed of the $300,000, and later suffers another kind of loss. Elio puts a plan in motion to exonerate Sara. Josefina makes a grave error.
episodes.title: Forced Confession

episodes.synopsis: Aracely's heartbreak is doubled. El Indio gives Empanada instructions for his mission. Elio pressures Sara to ask Quintanilla for one last job.
episodes.title: El Teca's Proposal

episodes.synopsis: El Teca asks Sara to meet him, but to come alone. Judge Creel calls Elio with a warning. Empanada embarks on his mission. Aracely confronts Martín.
episodes.title: Elio Is Followed

episodes.synopsis: Martín provokes Aracely until she snaps. The DEA plants a bug in the salon. Sara gets devastating news. Plutarco makes a confession to Aracely.
episodes.title: Hopeless Sara

episodes.synopsis: When Sara is accused of murder, she gets a new look and passport and goes on the run from the DEA and PGR. In a weak moment, Josefina calls Felipe.
episodes.title: Sara Is a Fugitive

episodes.synopsis: Sara narrowly escapes to L.A. but is soon found. Edith goes undercover again, this time getting a job at the salon. Josefina makes a sacrifice.
episodes.title: Salvador Is Resentful

episodes.synopsis: Sara agrees to work for El Teca under one condition. Arnulfo forces Pepito to work as a debt collector. Martín plots against Aracely.
episodes.title: El Indio Goes After Sara

episodes.synopsis: Sara has trouble getting a meeting with Montero, but a stranger offers help. Aracely's uncle visits the salon, triggering painful memories.
episodes.title: Sara Is Mugged

episodes.synopsis: Sara meets with Montero. Miriam spots Arnulfo in Guadalajara and confronts him. While his father is away, Pepito tries to run away again.
episodes.title: Closing the Deal

episodes.synopsis: Miriam and Joaquín act on their feelings for each other. When Salvador falls ill, Sara defies El Teca's orders. Josefina's son is kidnapped.
episodes.title: Sara Starts the Business

episodes.synopsis: To help Josefina get her son back, Sara meets with Felipe. Manuel pays Sara a surprise visit. El Teca lays a deadly trap for Edith.
episodes.title: Obsessed with Sara

episodes.synopsis: El Techa reveals a lifelong obsession. Sara opens a new front and is given her first task. Plutarco demands to know the truth about Aracely's job.
episodes.title: The Boss's Woman

episodes.synopsis: Plutarco reacts surprisingly to Aracely's confession. Cornelia proves untrustworthy. Felipe eliminates a threat. Sara and Quintanilla strike a deal.
episodes.title: New Deals

episodes.synopsis: Aracely uses her expertise to ruin Felipe's campaign. Sara and Joaquín go to San Diego to rescue Pepito. Manuel finds a way to bond with Salvador.
episodes.title: Sara Is a Savior

episodes.synopsis: While watching the news, Plutarco recognizes Aracely in the video with Felipe. Quintanilla overhears Arnulfo and Tuercas plotting against Sara.
episodes.title: Targeted for Murder

episodes.synopsis: Among the shootout's casualties is someone dear to Sara. Felipe takes extreme measures to ensure he's elected. Cornelia is caught red-handed.
episodes.title: Shielding Love

episodes.synopsis: Cornelia shifts suspicion from herself and onto Sara. Manuel is more than he pretends to be. Sara asks Quintanilla to kill someone.
episodes.title: Manuel Is Threatened

episodes.synopsis: As Sara visits Barba's brother with an offer, her smugglers make their way to the United States and Colombia. El Teca's tunnels hold a sad secret.
episodes.title: Sara's Regret

episodes.synopsis: Alicia endures a humiliating DEA interrogation. El Teca sends a warning to Cornelia. After giving El Teca an ultimatum, Sara is abducted by Felipe.
episodes.title: Cornelia Is Threatened

episodes.synopsis: Cornelia tells El Teca where the stolen money is hidden. The DEA gathers evidence to turn Sara against El Teca. Sara gets a troubling anonymous tip.
episodes.title: Felipe Is Found

episodes.synopsis: Cornelia is forced to confess. Sara learns El Teca is still using kids as mules, and later spots Manuel with El Indio. Josefina gives Berta a gift.
episodes.title: Because You're a Liar

episodes.synopsis: The DEA opens Sara's eyes to what's been happening behind her back. Berta accepts Sara's gift. Aracely preps Alicia to get revenge against the DEA.
episodes.title: Sara Is Kidnapped

episodes.synopsis: Alicia lures her prey. Aracely plans a questionable strategy to gather intel for Sara. Manuel realizes Sara is on to him. El Teca proposes to Sara.
episodes.title: Wife of El Teca?

episodes.synopsis: Aracely seduces El Indio. Sara replies to El Teca's proposal. A surprise move by Mexico's president upsets the lives of Sara and her family.
episodes.title: Go Away, Manuel

episodes.synopsis: Manuel finds Sara. When Miriam's torturers threaten to hurt Pepito, she spills. Plutarco learns what Aracely did with El Indio. Salvador is abducted.
episodes.title: Salvador Is Kidnapped

episodes.synopsis: Sara is forced to role-play a twisted fantasy with El Teca while Manuel, Joaquín and Plutarco try to rescue her son from the warehouse.
episodes.title: One Fewer Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Manuel makes an unexpected move while he and Sara are on the run. El Teca pulls some strings. Sara unknowingly leaves a loose end behind.
episodes.title: Sara Is Trapped

episodes.synopsis: After five years of waiting in prison, Sara receives an unexpected sentence. El Teca tries to kidnap Sara, but captures someone close to her instead.
episodes.title: Sara Is Condemned

episodes.synopsis: At the airport, El Indio scrambles to cover the cartel's tracks. Consuelo makes a sacrifice, enabling Sara and Faría to immediately attempt an escape.
episodes.title: Sara Tries to Escape

episodes.synopsis: El Teca gets a hint about the person who bribed the judge in Sara's sentencing. Sara finds herself stuck in close quarters with bully Makoki.
episodes.title: Makoki Wants to Fight

episodes.synopsis: At Mario's party, Aracely sees El Teca making a secret deal with a VIP. Sara is sent to the same hospital as her son. El Teca spots a familiar tattoo.
episodes.title: Sara Sees Salvador

episodes.synopsis: Aracely is used as a pawn. El Teca tells Sara who was behind her sentence and offers his protection. Manuel plans an ambush.
episodes.title: El Teca Can Free Sara

episodes.synopsis: A meeting in Cali turns ugly for Quintanilla. Sara and Manuel attack El Teca's ranch. El Indio tries to force Aracely to reveal the photo's source.
episodes.title: Sara Faces El Teca

episodes.synopsis: In a violent chase, Sara and Manuel must assume some risks. El Indio Amaro kills Plutarco.
episodes.title: Death's Witness

episodes.synopsis: Pepito goes to his job interview. El Teca launches a full-scale attack, resulting in mass casualties. Quintanilla learns a family secret.
episodes.title: El Indio Against Sara

episodes.synopsis: Miriam makes a difficult choice. Salvador has a scary episode. Pepito comes to a stranger's rescue. Sara realizes what she must do to conquer El Teca.
episodes.title: Salvador Tries to Kill Sara

episodes.synopsis: Peer pressure causes Pepito to make a poor choice. Sara's introduction to Mario leads to an important contact. Salvador wanders off and finds trouble.
episodes.title: Manuel Against El Teca

episodes.synopsis: Sara tries to save her son from his hallucinations. Joaquín regains consciousness. The debt collectors' threats force Sara to play her last card.
episodes.title: Sara Negotiates with El Teca

episodes.synopsis: El Teca demands proof of Sara's loyalty to him. Erick convinces Manuel to help him rob a bank. The attorney general asks to meet with Pepito.
episodes.title: Sara Becomes El Teca's Woman

episodes.synopsis: Sara moves in with El Teca, who gives her a memorable welcome. Salvador sneaks off to visit a drug dealer and meets fellow customer Begoña.
episodes.title: Manuel Feels Betrayed

episodes.synopsis: While searching for Salvador, Manuel runs into La Tuti and her attacker. Begoña introduces Salvador to a new drug. Sara sets up Quintanilla's capture.
episodes.title: Sara and El Indio to the Death

episodes.synopsis: Pepito has a change of heart about his job offer. Quintanilla sees an opportunity to get back in the game. Sara asks to negotiate with the Chinese.
episodes.title: Sara Negotiates with the Chinese

episodes.synopsis: Erick makes a strong impression on Briseida. Aracely questions Mario's intentions toward her. The DEA prepares to raid the meeting with the Chinese.
episodes.title: Briseida Is Jealous of Sara

episodes.synopsis: After starting a three-way shootout, Breseida asks El Indio to hand Sara over to her. Aracely overhears Mario in a troubling conversation with Aldama.
episodes.title: Sara and Briseida Face Each Other

episodes.synopsis: When El Teca catches Manuel coming to Sara's rescue, she makes a bold move to save his life. Sara forces El Teca to choose between her and El Indio.
episodes.title: Sara Kisses El Teca

episodes.synopsis: A heartbroken Manuel looks for a distraction. Josefina succumbs to Erick's advances. El Teca assigns Sara another test of loyalty.
episodes.title: Sara Is Given Another Test

episodes.synopsis: Salvador grabs a gun and goes to El Teca's ranch to get revenge. Mario seduces Aracely. Pepito confronts Begoña about her relationship with Salvador.
episodes.title: Sara Confesses Everything to Salvador

episodes.synopsis: Manuel seeks comfort in another woman's arms. Aldama and the music producer discuss their true interest in Aracely. El Teca reveals a family secret.
episodes.title: Manuel Moves On

episodes.synopsis: Pepito follows Begoña to La Tuti's home, where Salvador is waiting for her. Sara faces an unthinkable task. Briseida makes Erick pay for his betrayal.
episodes.title: Sara Is Forced to Shoot

episodes.synopsis: El Indio is fired, but doesn't go quietly. When the Cali cartel's first smuggling job hits a snag, Erick takes extreme action to save the operation.
episodes.title: El Indio Is Humiliated

episodes.synopsis: Upon their return home, Aracely gets a big surprise from Mario. Quintanilla gives Salvador a gun and an ultimatum. Sara falls victim to Rosa's potion.
episodes.title: A Trap for Sara

episodes.synopsis: El Indio follows Manuel and is shocked to see whom he meets up with. The attorney general tasks Pepito with identifying the suspects in the photo.
episodes.title: El Teca Discovers Sara’s Deceit

episodes.synopsis: Horacio has suspicions about Mario Casas’ intentions. The DEA decides to arrest Marcelo and confront his boss. El Indio Amaro tortures Sara.
episodes.title: El Indio Tortures Sara

episodes.synopsis: The president chooses between his wife and Berta. Dóriga escapes from jail to rescue Sara. Aracely catches Miriam and Cristian in an intimate moment.
episodes.title: Sara Tries to Finish Off El Teca

episodes.synopsis: Horacio confronts Mario alone. Berta gathers ammunition to use against the president. Sara goes to Manuel's home and is greeted by a surprise.
episodes.title: Dóriga Saves Sara

episodes.synopsis: Sara reveals to Manuel what happened to her at El Teca's ranch. El Indio calls El Teca's son. Begoña's father finds the gun under her bed.
episodes.title: Manuel Learns What Happened to Sara

episodes.synopsis: Sara tells her family the entire truth, but Quintanilla doesn’t believe her. Sara and Briseida face off to the death.
episodes.title: Briseida Refuses to Do Business with Sara

episodes.synopsis: Erick shows Josefina what she's been missing. A stranger sweeps La Tuti off her feet. Álvaro corners Sara and Salvador at gunpoint.
episodes.title: Sara Wants to Rehabilitate Salvador

episodes.synopsis: Sara walks in on a shocking scene. To get to Sara, Álvaro forms an alliance with La Tuti. Salvador starts to experience a diabetic complication.
episodes.title: Sara Learns Josefina's Secret

episodes.synopsis: Sara makes a decision about her son. Erick refuses to accept his demotion and finds El Indio to avenge his mother's death. Mario tests his new drug.
episodes.title: Begoña Discovers Miriam's Past

episodes.synopsis: El Gallo and El Indio Amaro fight to the death. Manuel shoots Álvaro and El Teca’s son saves Sara.
episodes.title: Erick and El Indio Fight

episodes.synopsis: The DEA targets Alicia again as a means of infiltration. La Tuti uses Salvador to lure Sara to her apartment. Horacio catches an intruder in his home.
episodes.title: Salvador's Loss

episodes.synopsis: During a shootout, Álvaro makes a cowardly move. Quintanilla responds to Dóriga's request for help. Mario tells Sara he wants to make her an offer.
episodes.title: Manuel Shoots El Teca's Son

episodes.synopsis: The first lady reacts to Berta's exposé. Aracely cuts ties with Mario. Sara admits her son to rehab, and later meets with Mario to hear his proposal.
episodes.title: Sara's Heart Aches for Salvador

episodes.synopsis: A problem with one of his test patients threatens Mario's plans. Erick draws a line with Josefina. Berta plans to use Josefina to get to Sara.
episodes.title: El Teca Awakens

episodes.synopsis: The Tijuana cartel suffers a big blow under Álvaro's leadership. Sara gets good news about Salvador. Briseida is shocked to see El Teca out in public.
episodes.title: Manuel and Sara Celebrate Their Anniversary

episodes.synopsis: In a video, the drug trafficker tells Señora Acero that he’ll make her pay. Caicedo promises that while he’s alive, everything will be fine.
episodes.title: El Teca Vows to Kill Sara

episodes.synopsis: Salvador's reunion with Begoña is not a happy one. El Teca forces Alfredo to be his double. Joaquín overhears Miriam discussing her doubts about him.
episodes.title: Revenge Is Set in Motion

episodes.synopsis: Josefina makes a confession to Quintanilla. While El Indio trains Alfredo, Dóriga coaches Salvador. El Teca gains access to paramilitary weapons.
episodes.title: El Teca Orders Sara's Elimination

episodes.synopsis: Miriam begs Joaquín to stay. Berta introduces Josefina to Rosalinda's mom. La Tuti tells Manuel her news. Salvador steals a sample of Mario's drug.
episodes.title: La Tuti Looks to the Future

episodes.synopsis: Berta forces Josefina to choose between her son and Sara. Javier overhears valuable intel via Alicia's bugged cellphone. Álvaro fires the bazooka.
episodes.title: Sara and the Plane Attack

episodes.synopsis: El Teca shows his double how to trap Señora Acero. Begoña escapes from the hospital. Horacio is shot at Aracely’s show.
episodes.title: Alfredo Trains to Fool Sara

episodes.synopsis: Begoña begs Salvador to forgive her. Manuel tells Sara about La Tuti. Dóriga finds the transmitter on Alicia's phone. La Tuti makes demands of Manuel.
episodes.title: Sara's Distraction

episodes.synopsis: Alfredo is put to the test. The attorney general follows a hunch. Alicia realizes Javier bugged her phone. Manuel asks Sara for a big personal favor.
episodes.title: Sara Meets with Alfredo

episodes.synopsis: The attorney general confirms who Salvador's mother is. Berta serves as a surrogate for Sara. La Tuti moves in. Erick offers Josefina an alternative.
episodes.title: Sara Forbids Salvador from Seeing Begoña

episodes.synopsis: The computer virus backfires on Pepito. El Tuti's attention-seeking behavior draws suspicion. Erick follows Josefina to her meeting with Berta.
episodes.title: Sara Wants to Destroy the Attorney General

episodes.synopsis: When Javier overhears Dóriga at the police raid, he swoops in to capture him. Begoña gives in to despair. La Tuti and Manuel get news from the doctor.
episodes.title: El Indio and Berta in the Aftermath

episodes.synopsis: Pepito turns the tables on the gunmen. When Manuel questions Sara's plans to rescue Dóriga, she explodes. Mario reveals a violent side to Aracely.
episodes.title: Miriam's Heartbreak

episodes.synopsis: Aracely threatens Mario so that he’ll leave her alone. Sara launches an operation to save Dóriga.
episodes.title: Aracely Threatens Mario

episodes.synopsis: Miriam tries to bargain with the attorney general. Sara's team launches a plan to rescue Dóriga. Josefina calls Berta in order to trace her location.
episodes.title: Salvador's First Cartel Operation

episodes.synopsis: Salvador plots his route to Los Angeles via the tunnels, unaware that El Teca has his own plans to use them. Sara finds La Tuti's secret cellphone.
episodes.title: Miriam and Pepito Are Arrested

episodes.synopsis: Mario launches his drone distribution system. Sara and Berta face off during the hostage exchange. Salvador embarks on his journey to L.A.
episodes.title: Sara and Berta Fight to the Death

episodes.synopsis: Dóriga confesses to Sara. La Tuti offers another man comfort. Salvador's health takes an untimely turn. Erick and Josefina reach a turning point.
episodes.title: El Teca Makes a Discovery in the Tunnel

episodes.synopsis: El Teca finds a new way to humiliate and punish Berta. Quintanilla reveals a family secret. Sara learns La Tuti told the attorney general about her.
episodes.title: Quintanilla Confronts Erick

episodes.synopsis: Sara reaches her limit with La Tuti, who may not be the only woman who's pregnant in the household. A hotel clerk recognizes a familiar face.
episodes.title: Quintanilla Makes a Decision

episodes.synopsis: Fearful of his next mission, Alfredo makes a run for it. Aldama gets what she wants. Two women receive test results. El Indio helps Berta escape.
episodes.title: Manuel Gets the DNA Test Results

episodes.synopsis: Manuel plots to help Salvador and Begoña return safely to Mexico. La Tuti calls Álvaro with news. El Teca ensures Alfredo never disobeys him again.
episodes.title: El Indio and Berta Make Their Escape

episodes.synopsis: Quintanilla and El Teca settle an old score. Mario's hospitalization reveals more than one secret. Berta tells Erick her news. Begoña gets a shock.
episodes.title: El Teca Goes After Quintanilla

episodes.synopsis: Aracely leads a mission to steal the drug formula from Mario's lab. The cartel's lifestyle proves too much for Begoña. Álvaro brings a guest home.
episodes.title: El Teca Hears His Son's News

episodes.synopsis: El Teca finds the bug on La Tuti's phone. A delivery rocks the Jalisco cartel to its core. Salvador tells Begoña the great lengths he'd go to for her.
episodes.title: Sara Receives Two Packages

episodes.synopsis: Begoña searches for a mental escape. El Teca tests La Tuti to see if she's an infiltrator. Stress and grief take a physical toll on Josefina.
episodes.title: Sara and Manuel Reconcile

episodes.synopsis: La Tuti is ambushed at her apartment. The attorney general follows his daughter's phone signal. Aracely learns the extent of Mario's crimes.
episodes.title: Erick Makes a Capture

episodes.synopsis: Begoña makes a decision about her future. Aracely sets out to avenge Horacio's death. Erick sends a gift to El Teca. Sara interrogates La Tuti.
episodes.title: Erick and Álvaro Face Off

episodes.synopsis: La Tuti is forced to submit to a lie detector test. Begoña finds an ally sympathetic to her plight. Rosa gives El Teca a tip about El Indio.
episodes.title: El Teca Goes Crazy

episodes.synopsis: Refusing to let Begoña go, Salvador pulls a dangerous stunt. El Teca underestimates his men's loyalty to El Indio.
episodes.title: El Indio Faces El Teca

episodes.synopsis: Miriam comes to a decision about her son. Salvador gives Begoña a secret lifeline to her father. Sara receives a surprising request for a meeting.
episodes.title: El Indio Wants to Talk to Sara

episodes.synopsis: Salvador makes a bold proposal. Mario surfaces in Buenos Aires and calls Aracely. El Teca follows a tip on Pepito's whereabouts.
episodes.title: El Teca Goes After a Target

episodes.synopsis: El Teca takes steps to ensure Alfredo feels the same grief he does, but ends up creating a fierce foe in the process. Aracely visits Aldama in prison.
episodes.title: Sara Vows Revenge

episodes.synopsis: Pepito warns the attorney general about Begoña's plans. In Buenos Aires, Mario hears a familiar voice singing. The mole leaks more info to El Teca.
episodes.title: Alfredo Wants to Kill El Teca

episodes.synopsis: Dóriga leaves on a mysterious mission. El Teca's men lie in wait for Pepito. Aracely makes Mario pay. Hiding the gel, Alfredo surrenders to El Teca.
episodes.title: Begoña Reunites with Her Father

episodes.synopsis: Dóriga turns himself in to the DEA to protect Salvador. Señora Acero’s son confesses that he betrayed Dóriga.
episodes.title: Dóriga Completes His Mission

episodes.synopsis: Sara and her team track down El Teca, who keeps Alfredo close to confuse them. Dóriga helps Javier set up a trap to catch the mole.
episodes.title: Sara and El Teca's Final Showdown

episodes.synopsis: Familiar faces pursue new ventures and relationships in Juárez. New face Vicenta has two close calls in El Paso. An old enemy lurks in Miami.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta and her mother cannot escape from the clutches of Don Chucho. The authorities ask Aída who helped her cross the border.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta's attempt to rescue her mom from Chucho's ranch sparks a bloody manhunt. La Tuti gets an intriguing invite. Pepito struggles in Los Angeles.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: With Chucho’s men close on her heels, Vicenta learns who her biological father is. Pepito begs the police not to evict him.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: The American authorities detain Vicenta. Chucho suspects that valuables were stolen from the ranch.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Margarita and her girls find out about the recent tragic death. Josefina discovers new information about Vicenta.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: After a struggle, Vicenta escapes her captor and crashes the wedding, where she makes a very public announcement.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: The wedding marks the start of a special bond between the Casares and Acero families. Vicenta and Abelardo make an escape and head for the border.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta swears to get revenge against Chucho. Mario becomes a potential donor. Chucho disavows Abelardo.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta and Abelardo flee when Daniel arrives. Pepito and Salvador meet in Mexico. Lorena cancels her honeymoon.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta tries to rescue her friends. Pepito enters a business collaboration with Manuel and Salvador. Aracely gets news about the transplant results.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: El Indio is furious that Vicenta escaped and swears to do away with her. Vicenta and Abelardo have an accident. Chucho runs for governor.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta and Salvador become closer after talking about their pasts. Ivanna hires Mario to represent her in her claim to regain her inheritance.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Salvador and Manuel interrogate Vicenta. Manuel tries to get information out of Vicenta about El Indio in order to kill him.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Lorena spots a couple engaged in an illicit kiss. Vicenta knows that Chucho is selling arms to drug traffickers.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta joins forces with Manuel and Salvador to hunt for El Indio, and kills someone for the first time during the ensuing gunfight.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Josefina and Lorena compare Erick to Salvador. Chucho’s daughter makes it clear that Salvador is the responsible party.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Manuel fights for his life. Abelardo visits Chucho. El Indio is angry about the consequences of the attack.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: The Acero family and their friends say goodbye and swear to get revenge. The American police receive a call from Vicenta.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta shows Abelardo a video she found of her mother confessing Chucho’s relationship with El Indio and the trafficking business.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: El Indio swears to kill Salvador for what he has done, and tortures Martin Connors in order to get information out of him.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta decides to marry Abelardo, who declares war on Chucho and demands the truth from Consuelo.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Delgado falls ill. Mario rents a house that belonged to a drug trafficker, with a helipad and an escape tunnel.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Not even Phillips is able to stop Vicenta from marrying. Margarita begins to stand out among the rest of the undocumented.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: The Aceros try to escape one of the murderers. Dóriga discovers a financial scandal involving Mario. Chucho gives the arms business to Lorena.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Salvador confronts El Indio to avenge the deaths of his loved ones. Vicenta says goodbye to the immigrants. Larry tells his boss that Vicenta escaped.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: El Indio tries to kill Salvador. Consuelo confronts La Tuti. Lorena and Josefina threaten each other with blackmail.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Abelardo tells Vicenta that Juan Pablo must die. Seriously wounded and delirious, El Indio inadvertently reveals a shocking secret to his men.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: El Gallo brings a traumatized Déborah to the ranch, where he drops a bombshell on a furious Josefina and the rest of the household.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Lorena steals the evidence Vicenta has against Chucho. Salvador confronts Erick. Consuelo balckmails Heriberto.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Chucho watches Edelmira’s video and is stunned to learn that Consuelo lied to him about Abelardo.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: After Chucho hits his mother, Abelardo threatens to kill him. Josefina flashes a pistol at Déborah.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Chucho and Abelardo enter into a fight that holds a fatal outcome. Erick nearly kills Larry, who escapes.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Pedro helps get Vicenta over the border without documents, but the border guards detain her.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Chucho makes a confession to El Indio about Abelardo. Vicenta stands in the way of Phillips' mother’s rash decision.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Phillips mounts a strategy with Vicenta to take down Larry. Chucho and El Indio close a deal. Josefina is kidnapped.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta is found in Phillips' custody. La Tuti surprises the butler while trying to flee the mansion. Larry tricks Erick.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Salvador and Erick end their business relationship. Chavela names the sole heir. Chucho and Heriberto visit Lorena.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta decides to work with Phillips in exchange for freedom. Chucho moves forward with his political campaign.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Larry negotiates with Josefina. During an operation, Agent Indira Cárdenas makes her presence known. Erick feels guilty about Josefina.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Josefina faces Larry. Aracely fights with Dóriga. Vicenta tells her friends about the pact she made with Phillips. Chucho has a visitor.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta visits her brother after the case is dismissed. Josefina flees her captor, but things go wrong. Rosario investigates Begoña.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Salvador discovers that someone has betrayed him when speaks with Rosario, who now knows how much he loved Begoña. Erick confronts Chucho.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta and Aracely enter the ranch to enact their plan. Erick sees that Josefina is alive. Indira proves to be a seductress.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Chucho pledges an allegiance against organized crime. Meanwhile, El Indio watches as the plan he ordered unfurls on television.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: A arms shipment is intercepted and David is captured by the Acero family. Erick orders him tortured.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: La Tuti gives part of her fortune to Mario with the promise to multiply it. Mario uses it to post Domingo’s bail, and gives him a mission.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Erick and the governor have a talk. Phillips gets his hands on a shipment of drugs, thanks to information from Vicenta.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Chucho attacks the Acero ranch and finds a dismembered body. Erick asks Josefina to forgive him.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Chucho has the judge give the order for the arrest of the Acero family. Vicenta and her team arm themselves up to their teeth.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Indira looks into the business of human smuggling across the border. Vicenta is offered refuge.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Phillips spends some time alone with Vicenta in order to get her to tell the truth about her connection to drug trafficking.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Phillips learns how Vicenta defends herself in the desert. El Indio and Larry disappear from sight.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: A bag filled with $200,000 is delivered into the hands of Indira’s supposed partners. Hiding in a truck, Daniel and Vicenta cross the border.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: An incognito Aracely manages to get a private meeting with Chucho. Mario follows Dóriga’s trail.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: La Coyote offers her assistance to Lulú. A connection between Indira and Chucho is revealed.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Chucho and Aracely meet. Pepito blackmails Rosario with a photo. Déborah confronts Erick about Josefina.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Phillips starts to see those who cross the border from a new point of view, and allows Vicenta to help Lulú.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Aracely and her daughter are kidnapped and forced to face a painful reality. Chucho issues a warrant for Dóriga's arrest.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta faces and threatens Pepito. Phillips tells the truth to his friend Sánchez.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Without a lawyer or prior hearing, Vicenta’s friends learn their fate. Lulú is ready to cross into the U.S. Déborah and Josefina confront each other.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta’s truck is searched on the border. Indira becomes upset upon finding out that Sánchez was the victim of an assault.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Aracely makes a decision about Dóriga. The Acero family obtains information on a secret device. Salvador pressures Vicenta to reveal her contact.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: After Chucho assures Aracely that he no longer has an arrest warrant against her, she tells him about a shipment of drugs.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: El Indio meets with Chucho, who asks for the heads of Erick and Vicenta. Pepito confesses his plans for Salvador to La Tuti.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: El Indio's men intercept a truck carrying drugs. Now Phillips and Salvador have common enemies.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Salvador and Phillips capture El Indio. Aracely and Erick try to flee with Belinda in their arms. Mario makes a big demand of La Tuti.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Salvador and Phillips follow the tracks of El Indio, who offers a juicy bribe. Chucho and Larry capture Aracely.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Phillips completes his mission and hands over El Indio to the authorities. Chucho uses Aracely against the Acero family.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: With great courage, Aracely withstands psychological stress and physical aggression at the hands of Chucho and Larry.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: The Acero family captures Chucho, but a scuffle ends with one man down. Larry holds Aracely hostage in order to get Belinda back.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Salvador and Vicenta face Chavela and Consuelo. Death and vengeance pervade the air, but Vicenta makes a difference.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: Chavela worries after information about Chucho's condition is leaked to the press. Photos of Rosario enrage Salvador.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: Chucho regains consciousness and swears to get revenge against the Aceros. Salvador becomes fed up with Rosario.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: Fabrizio fears the Russians will kill him and asks Indira to free El Indio so that he can help. Chavela has a plan to get rid of Chucho.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta assumes that Phillip’s mother could not have been kidnapped by Chucho, but later learns that he is still alive.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Salvador savagely beats and psychologically tortures El Indio. La Tuti meets her son. Indira protects Fabrizio from the Russians.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: Indira hides Fabrizio in her house. Sánchez recognizes the bandit, but must keep the secret. Salvador refuses to believe that Rosario was unfaithful.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Salvador tells El Indio that they can use him to trap Chucho. Indira risks her life to save her brother. Aracely and Dóriga reunite.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: El Indio goes to the hearing with the judge but seeks to negotiate his sentence first and does not reveal his connection to Chucho.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: The Russian mafia threatens Indira in order to get the whereabouts of her brother. Rosario gets in contact with Vicenta.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: Pepito sends a video to Salvador. La Tuti seeks Mario’s help in calming her child. Dóriga makes a pact with Aracely.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: Salvador confronts Pepito. Indira must release El Indio so that her brother will no longer be held hostage.
episodes.title: Episode 83

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Chucho want to stop Aracely and Dóriga's plans. Indira gives clues about El Indio to Larry, but he doesn’t follow through.
episodes.title: Episode 84

episodes.synopsis: Indira accuses Phillips of being a traitor and sees to it that he has nothing to do with El Indio’s transfer to a maximum security prison.
episodes.title: Episode 85

episodes.synopsis: Larry and El Roscas mount an operation to prevent El Indio’s transfer to a maximum security prison. Vicenta risks venturing out to the border.
episodes.title: Episode 86

episodes.synopsis: Phillips is blamed for El Indio’s escape. Indira falls victim to the trap laid for her. Chucho threatens to kill Heriberto and intends to resign.
episodes.title: Episode 87

episodes.synopsis: Phillips finds a way to escape from the ICE prison and goes to meet Vicenta. Aracely and Dóriga celebrate a joyful event.
episodes.title: Episode 88

episodes.synopsis: Mario bursts onto the Acero ranch. Dóriga’s best-kept secret comes to light. Larry awaits El Indio’s orders. Aracely falls victim once again.
episodes.title: Episode 89

episodes.synopsis: Erick and Phillips take revenge against Larry. Chucho loses his mind upon discovering the traitors and commences torturing them.
episodes.title: Episode 90

episodes.synopsis: With Heriberto out of the game, it’s now Consuelo’s turn. Larry gives in under torture and speaks. Indira rescues Fabrizio.
episodes.title: Episode 91

episodes.synopsis: Chucho attacks his mother and ends up with one of his escorts. Information on his connections appears in the headlines.
episodes.title: Episode 92

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta and Phillips intercept Indira while she's carrying out her mission. Chucho meets his fate. Dóriga’s daughter introduces her fiancé.
episodes.title: Episode 93

episodes.synopsis: After Chucho's death, the Aceros flee from the impending chaos. Indio gives Indira an ultimatum. She lashes out against the immigrants.
episodes.title: Los Acero en la clandestinidad

episodes.synopsis: The Mexican president declares war on the Aceros and they flee. Daniel and Vicenta rescue two children at the border. Indio makes the Roscas pay.
episodes.title: Prófugos de la justicia

episodes.synopsis: Salvador goes to extremes to protect his family. Indira captures Daniel. The president of Mexico and Indio confront each other.
episodes.title: Todo por la familia

episodes.synopsis: Important evidence falls into the hands of El Gallo. Vicenta tries to cross the border. Chaos reigns. Tuti is terrified when she sees Indio at Romero's.
episodes.title: Pruebas incriminatorias

episodes.synopsis: The President suggests killing the Aceros. Vicenta wears a disguise to visit her brother in prison. Mario plans on getting Elizabeth back.
episodes.title: El presidente contra Salvador

episodes.synopsis: Salvador is transferred to a maximum security prison. The president gives a speech and the Aceros are ready to attack. Mr. Romero plays both sides.
episodes.title: Momento de la verdad

episodes.synopsis: The police shoot at Phillips and capture Vicenta. Salvador meets his benefactor, who reminds him of the value of his name and promises to help him.
episodes.title: Vicenta y Phillips acorralados

episodes.synopsis: The president tortures Vicenta. Jaibo agrees to help Salvador but wants something in exchange. Problems arise with Mr. Romero's shipment.
episodes.title: Presidente torturador

episodes.synopsis: Indio Amaro takes a hostage. Despite being tortured, Vicenta refuses to give out information. The Arabs make Tuti test the product's quality.
episodes.title: La Coyote no suelta prenda

episodes.synopsis: Romero sends a "nurse" to help cure Vicenta's wounds. Jaibo thinks that the Aceros should give back the laundered money.
episodes.title: Como gato a su presa

episodes.synopsis: Indira and Indio Amaro make an exchange for Nicolás. Someone dies in a shootout. Vicenta is taken to the public prosecutor's office.
episodes.title: Intercambio sangriento

episodes.synopsis: Cayetana and Erick threaten to expose the president if he doesn't meet their demands. A document seals the deal and Gallo also benefits.
episodes.title: Pacto o escándalo

episodes.synopsis: The attorney is about to kill Vicenta. President Roca gives a press conference. A trap is set for La Coyote. Indira and Jorge look for Nicolás.
episodes.title: Vicenta, a punto de morir

episodes.synopsis: El Gallo decides to go to Tamaulipas with his whole family. Phillips wonders if Romero's lawyer is being honest. Now they're all fearing the worst.
episodes.title: La astucia Romero

episodes.synopsis: Nicolás's father puts a price on the kidnappers' heads. Indio threatens Indira. Tuti tells some half truths and Jaibo saves Salvador's life.
episodes.title: Peligrosa recompensa

episodes.synopsis: Indira is so desperate to rescue her son that she does everything Indio Amaro asks. However, some of his demands are impossible to meet.
episodes.title: Sexo a la fuerza

episodes.synopsis: Romero plans two attacks on the Aceros. Indio Amaro sends Indira a video showing Nicolás. Indira tells Daniel about the kidnapping.
episodes.title: El punto débil de Indira

episodes.synopsis: El Gallo is involved in dirty business and owes millions of dollars. Salvador wants to help him and suggests returning the laundered money.
episodes.title: El Gallo en problemas

episodes.synopsis: Nicolás's exchange is about to happen. However, there is a surprise in store in the truck for Indio Amaro. Indira receives a black bag with a corpse.
episodes.title: Rescate en marcha

episodes.synopsis: Romero pays Rosario's bail but his help comes at a cost. Phillips surrounds Indio Amaro's hideout and a shoot-out ensues. Dórigo has Mario followed.
episodes.title: Favor con amor se paga

episodes.synopsis: Nicolás panics, caught in the middle of open fire. Indira joins the rescue efforts but unforeseen events ruin everything.
episodes.title: Indira desespera

episodes.synopsis: A message from Indio Amaro shows Nicolás wearing the same bloody shirt. As a sign of revenge, he will not send the remains to be buried.
episodes.title: Padres desconsolados

episodes.synopsis: Indira is taken hostage at the funeral. Casas wants Indio Amaro to be his main distributor. El Gallo launches his candidacy. Nico is Tiburón II.
episodes.title: Locura desenfrenada

episodes.synopsis: The Aceros celebrate the news about a future heir. Romero demands that the doctor give his mother special treatment.
episodes.title: La pesadilla de los Acero

episodes.synopsis: Casas gives José Ángel money and instructions. Pepito runs into Salvador. Tuti spies on Vicenta to help her boss and lover.
episodes.title: Vicenta en bandeja de plata

episodes.synopsis: A sneaky, alert, and armed Phillips uses his keen nose to sniff out some clues. Romero offers more money. El Gringo suspects the Colombian.
episodes.title: Superhéroes que no engañan

episodes.synopsis: Romero and Indio argue. Rosario fears she'll lose the baby. El Gallo has fun with La Tuti and her friends. Indira bribes Tecolote.
episodes.title: Narcos enardecidos

episodes.synopsis: Mendoza and her men find Sánchez's van, license plate, and phone. They say goodbye to Aída and the child from the ranch. Laura calls border patrol.
episodes.title: Indira bajo sospecha

episodes.synopsis: La Coyote finds out who the gangsters negotiating with Salvador are. They discover connections between the migrants and narcos in Sánchez's files.
episodes.title: Vicenta enfrenta a Los Petates

episodes.synopsis: Salvador finalizes negotiations with the Petates. Chavita tells La Coyote the truth. Roscas, La Tuti and her friends are Romero's victims.
episodes.title: El negocio redondo de Salvador

episodes.synopsis: Dóriga, Domingo and Gallo spy on Casas and Pepito. Tiburón II sets his sights on Pepito. Phillips tries to help Aída. Vicenta thinks about Romero.
episodes.title: Reclutado por el Cártel

episodes.synopsis: Jaibo, Salvador, and Bebote meet outside of prison. Chava wants to stop the Petates' greediness. The Aceros are finding it tough to stay alive.
episodes.title: Otro enemigo para Los Acero

episodes.synopsis: The Aceros try to find out who the enemy from the past is. Dóriga gives Domingo instructions on how to find Casas and then, Indio.
episodes.title: Domingo se la juega

episodes.synopsis: Romero gets consent from the La Coyote and Daniel. As a specialist in human rights, he will go to the apartment where Aída will stay.
episodes.title: Mente asesina

episodes.synopsis: El Gringo tries to give Romero the money for Aída's bail but the lawyer rejects the offer. The Petates make a deal with Indio.
episodes.title: Mala espina

episodes.synopsis: A call from Carmencita provides some clues to help rescue Nicolás. The Argentine is ready to avenge a death.
episodes.title: Un ejército al rescate

episodes.synopsis: Nico tries to flee but falls into the clutches of criminals who want to hold him for ransom. Casas manages to escape. Vicenta knows who has the child.
episodes.title: A balazo limpio

episodes.synopsis: Romero and Indio agree to take revenge on the Acero-Quintanillas. Nico is in shock. Mendoza and Quiroz find a family grave.
episodes.title: Ojo por ojo

episodes.synopsis: Salvador is mugged. Chino tells Romero that everything went well. Chava has got another debt to worry about but Josefina has an idea.
episodes.title: Salvador "muerde" el anzuelo

episodes.synopsis: El Gallo is on the lookout. Phillips overhears a conversation between Romero and Vicenta. Casas blackmails the president.
episodes.title: Francotirador

episodes.synopsis: The Colombian's revenge on the Aceros becomes reality. The candidate loses control. La Tuti suspects that Romero is the brains behind the attack.
episodes.title: Una guerra sin fin

episodes.synopsis: El Gallo says goodbye to Débora and promises to get revenge. Salvador shows up with Romero. Chava thanks Aída for her help.
episodes.title: Un lobo, un corderito

episodes.synopsis: The Argentine accuses El Gallo and the Aceros in a TV message. The Aceros plan their counterattack. Vicenta and Phillips agree to protect Dóriga.
episodes.title: Casas lanza una “bomba”

episodes.synopsis: Andrea has a crisis just when the Aceros come up with an escape plan for her. Casas sets a trap for El Gallo and his men. Nicolás wakes up.
episodes.title: La ruta de la muerte

episodes.synopsis: The Aceros say a last farewell to their hero, Pancho Panteón, and Andrea. Salvador is ready to open fire on Casas but Phillips has another plan.
episodes.title: Doble funeral

episodes.synopsis: Dóriga tortures Casas and finds out some information. Tuti is in Indio Amaro's sights. El Gringo's informant finds out where Sánchez's remains are.
episodes.title: Verdades que matan

episodes.synopsis: La Coyote contacts Romero to calm Aída down. They meet up and he convinces her. An envelope with a photo of José Ángel scares Rosario.
episodes.title: Otro secreto de La Coyote

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta is surprised by Daniel's proposal. Indio gives orders to have La Tuti killed. Indira finds her son. Nicolás threatens to commit suicide.
episodes.title: Una familia con Vicenta

episodes.synopsis: Roscas fights with Tecolote and his gang in the ambush. La Tuti and the girls are on their way to hell. The Aceros mourn another death.
episodes.title: Premio gordo

episodes.synopsis: Romero goes to look for La Tuti at Indio Amaro's ranch. A juicy offer could free La Tuti. Phillips and Vicenta will take care of Elizabeth.
episodes.title: Cheque en blanco

episodes.synopsis: A video will show who Romero really is and his connection to La Tuti. Phillips leads the operation to trap Indira but it doesn't go according to plan.
episodes.title: La prueba del heredero

episodes.synopsis: Indira kidnaps Phillips. Romero is now the boss of Indio and all his men. Together they will take revenge on the Aceros.
episodes.title: Un rehén para escapar

episodes.synopsis: Indira resorts to blackmail to speak to her son. Carmencita and Rosario cross paths at the doctor's and share stories. Salvador gets a surprise.
episodes.title: Los muertos hablan

episodes.synopsis: Phillips needs another transfusion and emergency surgery. Vicenta is scared about losing the love of her life. Pepito runs away with Carmencita.
episodes.title: Phillips en la cuerda floja

episodes.synopsis: Salvador, El Gallo, and Bebote follow the tracks of a heavy vehicle to find Indio Amaro's ranch. Cuevas convinces Aída to testify against the Joneses.
episodes.title: Al acecho

episodes.synopsis: Phillips is honored and decorated. Daniel is surprised to meet the new lawyer in charge of Aída's case. El Gallo, Salvador and Bebote confront Lumbre.
episodes.title: Trago amargo

episodes.synopsis: Cuevas has several complaints about Phillips. Vicenta orders Daniel to tell her everything about her past. Lumbre makes a deal with the Aceros.
episodes.title: Conflictos del pasado

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta prepares Aída for the crossing. Frida looks for Daniel and delays him. The inspection at the border crossing makes La Coyote tense.
episodes.title: El cruce de Aída

episodes.synopsis: Phillips insists on marrying Vicenta but she has bad memories. They torture Indio and Tecolote. Aída sends the first piece of evidence.
episodes.title: Miedo al matrimonio

episodes.synopsis: Aída keeps a secret. Lumbre infiltrates and does right by the Aceros. They reject Cárdenas's request.
episodes.title: Maldita casualidad

episodes.synopsis: Romero explodes in rage when he finds out that Phillips confiscated the merchandise. El Gringo tortures the captive. Vicenta will lead more migrants.
episodes.title: El soplón

episodes.synopsis: Diego meets Phillips. Vicenta wants to know if El Gringo is the father and asks for a DNA test. Indira is surprised in prison. Gallo is arrested.
episodes.title: Torbellino de amor y dolor

episodes.synopsis: Josefina accepts Triple R's condition so that the charges against her husband, Erick Quintanilla, are dropped. Cuevas wants to leave Aída's case.
episodes.title: Un trato humillante

episodes.synopsis: Cuevas confirms with Romero that Diego is Daniel's son. Phillips receives the DNA results but the body of his only witness has disappeared.
episodes.title: Vínculo de sangre

episodes.synopsis: Phillips gives orders to have Indira's family relocated. Cárdenas negotiates with Romero and now they have a common enemy. Tecolote commits a murder.
episodes.title: Todos contra Phillips

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta and her allies unleash their fury on the president. Tecolote tricks everyone. Romero lets Indira speak to his son. Frida receives a summons.
episodes.title: Los Acero raptan al presidente

episodes.synopsis: The Aceros make the president confess all his crimes. They uncover Triple R's business with the government and achieve their goal.
episodes.title: El presidente suelta la sopa

episodes.synopsis: Romero orders gunfire against the Aceros. Indira guides the narcos to the Golfo's cartel tunnels but then betrays them. Frida is arrested.
episodes.title: Romero despista a Los Acero

episodes.synopsis: Romero's plan to make Daniel bond with his son works out perfectly. Then, he wants to make him suffer. Indira is recaptured.
episodes.title: El hijo del Gringo es el anzuelo

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta and Daniel take Diego with them and the Acero-Quintanillas welcome him. Frida confesses in prison. El Gallo wins the elections.
episodes.title: Hijo de Phillips, un Acero más

episodes.synopsis: Indira begs Romero to give her another chance and she wants extra hours to get her revenge and take down the Aceros. Vicenta might be pregnant.
episodes.title: Romero e Indira hacen el amor

episodes.synopsis: El Indio kidnaps women and children of the Acero Clan. Amaro proposes a trade: La Coyote for his entire family’s freedom.
episodes.title: El Indio secuestra a los Acero

episodes.synopsis: Indio wants La Coyote to hunt the migrants that work like slaves for him. Behind a monitor, Indio threatens to take revenge on Vicenta.
episodes.title: Vicenta acepta ser canjeada

episodes.synopsis: La Coyote faces El Indio in Nahual, the agreed upon point for the exchange for his family. Salvador and El Gallo are in charge of the rescue.
episodes.title: Vicenta y Phillips burlan al enemigo

episodes.synopsis: In an intense fight, the Acero name stands firm and a shot in the forehead takes a life. Indio and Indira have an alibi.
episodes.title: Roscas paga con su vida

episodes.synopsis: José Ángel "Pepito" Godoy makes a sacrifice to save Rosario's and the children’s lives. Vicenta confides in Aída about the pregnancy test.
episodes.title: Pepito se suicida

episodes.synopsis: The Acero-Quintanillas manage to capture the former boss of the Tijuana cartel. Vicenta prays for Phillips to wake up.
episodes.title: Ajustician al Indio Amaro

episodes.synopsis: After Phillips' death, Vicenta infuriates Teca Martínez. Six years later, Danielito is kidnapped during a Gallo Quintanilla campaign stop.
episodes.title: Vicenta cobra venganza

episodes.synopsis: As revenge for his son's death, Teca orders the kidnapping of Mrs. Acero's son. The Aceros plan to find Teca before it happens.
episodes.title: El objetivo

episodes.synopsis: Alberto goes to great lengths to show that Vicenta isn't responsible for Teca's escape and the murdered police. Teca falls into the hands of the Pigs.
episodes.title: Alberto salva a Vicenta

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta and her son flee her enemies; Alberto puts himself at risk by helping. El Gallo and the FBI lay a trap for the Marranos.
episodes.title: El adios a la familia

episodes.synopsis: Danielito disappears without a trace. El Teca and the Marranos destroy Tuti's brothel. El Gallo rises in the polls and wants to help Vicenta.
episodes.title: Perdido

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta and her son move in with Alberto, who promises to protect and pamper them. The Pigs and Teca force Hector Ruiz to make a deal with them.
episodes.title: Vivir en pareja

episodes.synopsis: After Almeida's surprise visit to Alberto's house, Vicenta and her son flee. The Aceros' ranch is closed and they lose their license to breed horses.
episodes.title: La Fuga

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta and Danielito's kidnappers see a video offering gold if they're turned over alive, and plan to exchange them. The Marranos look for Tuti.
episodes.title: Valen oro

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta bargains with the eldest Marrano: he'll use her as bait, kill Teca, and keep the gold. Salvador thinks Teca is behind the crisis at the ranch.
episodes.title: El pacto

episodes.synopsis: An FBI operation led by Alberto Fuentes aims to rescue Vicenta and her son, but they face resistance. Mrs. Acero remains trapped in the well.
episodes.title: Alberto tras Vicenta

episodes.synopsis: A fierce battle explodes between Salvador Acero and Teca Martinez, both of whom seek to avenge a death. Ruiz plays a dirty trick on Rooster.
episodes.title: Pelea a muerte

episodes.synopsis: Teca falls into the hands of the Aceros, who want him to pay for the suffering he's caused. Rooster's son is arrested. Tuti has to tell the truth.
episodes.title: La tortura

episodes.synopsis: To get Vicenta off the FBI's Most Wanted list, Alberto forges a signature, risking his career. Teca is in a coma and Sofia is taking care of him.
episodes.title: Todo por Vicenta

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta wants to help find a heart for Almeida, but she receives a surprise. Felipe wants to kill Rooster after seeing a picture of him with Samantha.
episodes.title: El disgusto

episodes.synopsis: Sofia tries to alter Danielito's fate as she responds to orders that Teca supposedly gave her. Tuti confronts Ruiz and suffers the consequences.
episodes.title: La pelea

episodes.synopsis: Alberto thinks that Sofia is still a danger to Vicenta and Danielito. Leticia is in charge of catching Sofia. Aida and Juan Pablito flee to Morelia.
episodes.title: Un cabo suelto

episodes.synopsis: Sofia prepares for an attack that will end the Aceros using an army of men tattooed with mandrakes. Old Major escapes and threatens Vicenta.
episodes.title: Los Mandrakes

episodes.synopsis: Alberto tells Vicenta that he's attracted to her. Old Major attacks Sofia. Salvador undergoes a crisis. Hector accompanies Josefina to her mammogram.
episodes.title: Cortejar

episodes.synopsis: Aida leaves Sarita in a church; Salvador and Rosario pick her up, and she is welcomed by the Aceros. Josefina confirms that she has stage 4 cancer.
episodes.title: Sarita Acero

episodes.synopsis: Teca suggests an alliance to take on the Acero-Quintanillas. His first goal? Salvador. Alberto wonders about his relationship with Vicenta.
episodes.title: Negociar la alianza

episodes.synopsis: After torturing Azuceno, Teca and his men kidnap Salvador and his family. Vicenta and Alberto realize that they're in Mexico and go to their rescue.
episodes.title: Sangre y venganza

episodes.synopsis: Teca is ready to kill Salvador. Alberto and Vicenta arrive to face the enemy. Josefina plans to have a mastectomy. Rooster faces down Samantha.
episodes.title: Debate entre la vida y la muerte

episodes.synopsis: The fight with Salvador leaves Teca badly injured. Alberto's in trouble: his boss wants a recap of the raid where he killed Old Major to save Leticia.
episodes.title: Débil

episodes.synopsis: Salvador suffers a crisis. Alberto faces tough questioning for not having followed his boss' instructions. Samantha seeks an abortion.
episodes.title: El destino golpea

episodes.synopsis: Brutus has his eye on the Aceros, and Mandrake orders them shot. Alberto is jailed for assault. Samantha plans to have an underground abortion.
episodes.title: El ataque

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta decides to leave with her son to ensure their safety, but Alberto wants them to come back. Josefina feels like a monster after surgery.
episodes.title: Vicenta se aleja

episodes.synopsis: The Mandrakes locate Vicenta, Danielito, and Lucas. With weapon in hand, Alvarito has to make a tough decision; Teca corners Tuti.
episodes.title: La Persecución

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta's only option is to accept Lucas' proposal. Tuti suffers due to her son's new mindset and Teca's rebuff. Erick aims to rescue Alvarito.
episodes.title: Un nuevo rumbo

episodes.synopsis: Almeida's friends identify a drop spot. Alberto plans a raid to find Teca and asks Erick for help. Leticia and Floyd are on their trail.
episodes.title: La alianza

episodes.synopsis: Leticia arrives at the drop spot and fires on Sofia. Tuti tries to persuade her son Alvarito. Teca gives his grandson a new mission.
episodes.title: Cara a cara

episodes.synopsis: Sofía completes her mission. Ruiz and Floyd go to a party. Teca Martínez loses his head and ends up covered in blood. Vicenta is under pressure.
episodes.title: La locura del Teca

episodes.synopsis: Juan Ramón receives a new batch of contraband and pays his associates in a very unusual way. Vicenta has her suspicions about Lucía.
episodes.title: El infierno del Paraíso

episodes.synopsis: Alberto can't stop thinking about Vicenta. The ex-FBI agent gains access to Leticia's phone and is surprised. Gallo and Ruiz confront each other.
episodes.title: Al descubierto

episodes.synopsis: While Gallo and Alberto are talking, a sniper awaits the order to open fire. A tourist dies at the inn. Teca suffers with his new hand.
episodes.title: Un dolor de cabeza menos

episodes.synopsis: Juan Ramón wants Vicenta out of the way. Danielito tells family secrets to Mrs. Mecha, exposing his mother. Alberto flees from the police.
episodes.title: En peligro

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta realizes that the only way to live is for Teca to die. Mrs. Mecha experiences suffering close-up. Lucía pays for her alliance with Juan Ramón.
episodes.title: Sin esperanzas

episodes.synopsis: Teca might die. Vicenta meets an ally who wants to help her bury the past. Almeida discovers the brains behind the attempt on Alberto's life.
episodes.title: Por la libertad

episodes.synopsis: Lucas finds Tablas and doesn't want to have drugs at his business. Ruiz wants to join in a new project. Alvarito has a surprise for his mother.
episodes.title: Las pastillas milagrosas

episodes.synopsis: Fuentes enters the secure area where Smith is, but the inmates are suspicious of him. Alvarito receives a treasured gift from his grandfather.
episodes.title: El topo

episodes.synopsis: At the inn, Juan Ramón accuses Mecha of poisoning tourists and Azuceno finds a pill to test. Samantha faints while at Ruiz's house.
episodes.title: La prueba

episodes.synopsis: As Smith and Alberto sleep, several inmates attack them. Leticia sees the message from her ex-colleague. Teca feels like Vicenta is shadowing him.
episodes.title: La emboscada

episodes.synopsis: Samantha suffers because of Ruiz's stance. Alberto takes advantage of a slip-up by Smith to look at his computer. Rooster has a mission for Azuceno.
episodes.title: El gobernador

episodes.synopsis: Teca tells Sofia that he can't do it anymore. Armed, Vicenta surprises Tablas. Alberto talks to Azuceno, unaware that Smith's men are recording them.
episodes.title: El sacrificio del capo

episodes.synopsis: Lucas and Vicenta are traveling in the same truck. Smith suspects Alberto. Leticia hears Almeida and Gallo discussing Alberto's possible location.
episodes.title: Muy cerca

episodes.synopsis: Almeida and Rooster go to Alberto's rescue in a risky operation. Floyd learns about the mole's activities. Vicenta and Nancy flee.
episodes.title: El escape

episodes.synopsis: Josefina is still in love with Rooster, but Héctor proposes to her in public. Almeida and Alberto surround Teca's land. Tablas is in a bind.
episodes.title: La verdad de Ruíz

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta and Nancy escape and arrive at the inn in search of Danielito. Juan Ramón knows he will make a lot of money if he turns in Teca.
episodes.title: Vicenta vale oro

episodes.synopsis: Teca discovers the whereabouts of his arch-enemy and wants to avenge his child's death. Juan Ramón makes a drastic decision.
episodes.title: Al ataque

episodes.synopsis: Azuceno gives Vicenta's information to Alberto and he sets out on a search. Juan Ramón teams up with Teca to kill Mrs. Acero.
episodes.title: La busquedad

episodes.synopsis: El Teca recruits Juan Ramón, who saved his life, and brands him with the new symbol: BS (Bullets and Blood), as part of the Tijuana cartel's relaunch.
episodes.title: El rebautizo

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta seeks help in Arizona from an ex-capo, betrayed by Teca, who wants to help finish him. Chepina wants to be governor, and Rooster supports her.
episodes.title: La ayuda

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta goes to the US to meet Arturo Landino, the boss she plans to work with to destroy Teca. Ruiz gets visitors in prison, triggering a fight.
episodes.title: La frontera

episodes.synopsis: Teca threatens to kill Tuti and all her girls if Alvarito leaves again. Fuentes is in charge of the raid at the presidential palace.
episodes.title: La amenaza familiar

episodes.synopsis: The FBI intercepts Teca's call with Floyd, but the leader of Bullets and Blood is laying a trap. Vicenta decides to risk crossing the border.
episodes.title: Burlar la seguridad

episodes.synopsis: Lucía's nerves give her away and she has problems with the border agent. Almeida figures out Vicenta's location. Azuceno is unscathed from the blast.
episodes.title: Vicenta se complica

episodes.synopsis: Alberto comes to the shelter looking for Vicenta and her son. Tuti hatches a plan to convince Teca to end the war. Mr. Nice Guy orders a mission.
episodes.title: La confusión

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta expects to choose the rules, the strategy, and the troops to face Teca. Alberto loses consciousness.
episodes.title: Condiciones al nuevo socio

episodes.synopsis: Josefina appears on TV to state that she wants to be governor. Teca believes that she is betraying Ruiz and plans to assassinate her mid-campaign.
episodes.title: En el blanco del Teca

episodes.synopsis: For the first time, Alvarito seals a deal with the traffickers, per his grandfather, Teca's, instructions. Samantha goes to the prison and baits Ruiz.
episodes.title: Alvarito ya es un narco

episodes.synopsis: Hatred and jealousy push Leticia to extremes. Alvarito and Tuti deliver a message to Gallo and Felipe. Ruiz wants to get rid of Chepina.
episodes.title: Bajo Amenaza

episodes.synopsis: A riot serves as a distraction to free Héctor, but the Aceros intercept the ex-governor's car. Samantha tries on Chepina's wedding dress.
episodes.title: El plan de fuga

episodes.synopsis: Teca threatens his flesh and blood and pressures them to tell the truth. Alvarito shows his dark side as he saves Tuti. Ruiz is in trouble.
episodes.title: El precio de la traición

episodes.synopsis: Tuti forgets Teca's warnings and ends up in chains for spying on him and giving him up to the Aceros. Teca's first cache is found.
episodes.title: El poder de seducción

episodes.synopsis: The Aceros are taken by surprise. Rebeca bribes the warden of Ruiz's prison. Tuti is locked up in a cell.
episodes.title: El regalo de bodas

episodes.synopsis: Alvarito risks himself for the Aceros in Teca's hideout, providing key details to help capture his grandfather. Felipe swears to avenge Samantha.
episodes.title: El juego sucio

episodes.synopsis: Due to Samantha's death, Vicenta declares war on Teca; when she goes to find Danielito, he's not there.
episodes.title: La desaparición

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta's son is kidnapped; Alberto, again an FBI agent, is sent to rescue him. Alvarito, Tuti, and Anita flee, and Teca orders them captured.
episodes.title: El rescate

episodes.synopsis: Danielito is the prize Teca wants to dangle for getting revenge on Vicenta, and Ruiz has him. The FBI plans to rescue Vicenta's son.
episodes.title: El chantaje

episodes.synopsis: Josefina confronts Teca, but he won't give up the Aceros' location. Ruiz uses fake passports to flee with Danielito.
episodes.title: Coraje

episodes.synopsis: Under Teca's orders, Josefina records a video saying that her cancer returned, but her family is suspicious. Ruiz is questioned and tortured.
episodes.title: Entregada a la muerte

episodes.synopsis: Ruiz joins a witness protection program in exchange for his information about Teca, but his tips are useless.
episodes.title: Bandeja de plata

episodes.synopsis: Suspecting that the Aceros have information that compromises his security, Teca switches hideouts, taking his hostage, who negotiates her own release.
episodes.title: El cambio de escondite

episodes.synopsis: Alberto, Vicenta, and the FBI go to the safe house, but Teca isn't there. They negotiate a swap of Chepina and Vicenta, who has to go alone, unarmed.
episodes.title: El canje

episodes.synopsis: Almeida and Alberto watch the place where Josefina will be swapped for Vicenta, but Brutus and Ramón take her.
episodes.title: Vicenta se entrega

episodes.synopsis: Teca finds Mr. Nice Guy and Danielito's hideout; Vicenta senses that something is happening to her son. Chepina goes home alive and ready to campaign.
episodes.title: La sorpresa

episodes.synopsis: Trapped by the enemy, Mecha takes courage, grabs a weapon, and faces down Mexico's most powerful drug lord and his henchmen to protect Vicenta's son.
episodes.title: Jugarse la vida

episodes.synopsis: Vicenta fights with Teca. Mecha is arrested while Danielito escapes into the desert. The Aceros get good news. Alberto receives an award from the FBI.
episodes.title: En manos de Vicenta
